name: Denny
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to Denny!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: I made a lot of friends at Nanchang No.10 Senior High School.
text4: I'm going to do something special on February 1st
text5Entry: You are a good friend who always inspires me
text5Content: You have given Denny a lot of happiness and love
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
